commands.name: az iot du device module show
commands.summary: Show a device module identity imported to the instance.
commands.syntax:
az iot du device module show --account
                             --device-id
                             --instance
                             --module-id
                             [--resource-group]
examples: az iot du device module show -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} -d {device_id} -m {module_id}
